dc_title_s: MassGIS 2003 Massachusetts Geographic Place Names : Hydrographic Features (March 2003)
dc_description_s: This point datalayer represents place names for hydrographic features in the state of Massachusetts (March 2003), which may be used for map labels. The Massachusetts Department of Environmental Protection (DEP) GIS Group and MassGIS maintain the data. Geographic Place Names for the state are grouped into 3 separate datalayers: Hydrographic Features - lakes, ponds, streams, rivers, bays, harbors, channels Civic Features - city and town names, sections, villages Hypsographic Features - hills, mountains, points, beaches, islands
dc_publisher_s: Office of Geographic and Environmental Information (MassGIS)
